thread.title: Ground News - Antisemitic abuse and Islamophobia rose sharply after start of Hamas-Israel conflict
thread.title_full: Ground News - Antisemitic abuse and Islamophobia rose sharply after start of Hamas-Israel conflict

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Antisemitic abuse and Islamophobia rose sharply after start of Hamas-Israel conflict
text:
Summary by Ground News West Yorkshire Police recorded 49 such crimes in the month after October 7 this year, as opposed to 29 in 2022 – a rise of 69 per cent. Greater Manchester Police recorded 74 antisemitic offences, compared with 15 for the same period in 2022 and 14 in 2021. West Midlands Police recorded 22 offences from October 7 to November 7.
